feed.title: The Chicago Graphic Design Club
feed.subtitle: The Chicago Graphic Design Club is a community for designers to engage in conversation about Graphic Design across Chicago & beyond. We focus on amplifying the theory & practice of Graphic Design through conversation & community. We advocate for new ideas & champion diversity of thought.

entry.title: FirstName LastName
